chart.title: Agricultural value added per worker
chart.subtitle: Agricultural [value added per worker](#dod:valueaddedperworker) is calculated by dividing the amount of economic value generated from farming, forestry and fishing by the number of people that work in these sectors. This data is expressed in US dollars. It is adjusted for inflation but does not account for differences in the cost of living between countries.
chart.note: Data is expressed in constant 2015 US$.
chart.citation: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
